Date: Thursday, 6/5/1992
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
David Palmer



Date: Tuesday, 6/10/1992
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Dante Bichette



Date: Sunday, 6/15/1992
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Julio Franco

I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Keith Moreland



Date: Wednesday, 6/18/1992
Subject: Craig Grebeck healing process
Craig Grebeck is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 7/21/1992
Subject: Progress of Damian Miller
Dear Sir,
Damian Miller is hitting the ball well at AA Shreveport Captains!
He has an AVG of .293, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 7/28/1992
Subject: Progress of Jason Bates
Dear Sir,
Jason Bates has an AVG of .309 at A San Jose Giants!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
